org.gbif.api.service.registry

Interface TagService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CollectionEntityService<T>, CollectionService, DatasetService, InstallationService, InstitutionService, NetworkEntityService<T>, NetworkService, NodeService, OrganizationService, PersonService, PrimaryCollectionEntityService<T>

    public interface TagService
    Service provides a set of operations on Tag.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Delete an existing Tag from a tagged entity by tag key.
